rows.label: qst710301_msg0002
rows.name:
You look like you're
interested in my inventions!

rows.label: qst710301_msg0003
rows.name:
What do you think? Of these
wonderful works of mine!

rows.label: qst710301_msg0004
rows.name:
They're certainly not inferior to
those of the Superbian Empire!

rows.label: qst710301_msg0005
rows.name:
...But, I'm stuck on creating a new
invention that surpasses these.

rows.label: qst710301_msg0006
rows.name:
Because of the recent tense
situation, I just can't seem to
gather the necessary machine parts...

rows.label: qst710301_msg0007
rows.name:
So, I have a proposal.
Could you all help me
collect some machine parts?

rows.label: qst710301_msg0008
rows.name:
I need the machine parts that
are lying around here in Iira!
I'm counting on you!
